name: Homeseek + Original Soundtrack
description:
Survive the post-apocalyptic future, then let the sounds that guided you to victory to inspire you to conquer the present day!

This bundle includes the full game and the entire original soundtrack, with 9 compositions by Manu Charitakis. With melodies that are surprisingly soothing and at times hauntingly beautiful, let their captivating accompany you throughout your trials in the wasteland and serve as a stirring backdrop as you participate in your very own real-world survival story.
